EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-18-Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-09-26.EMAIL - Ex
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Kings vs Canadiens
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On Wednesday, October 18th, the Turbonomic Suite will be full of your technology peers for an evening of food, drinks, and of course, Hockey, with Turbonomic and Cisco while the Los Angeles Kings take on the Montreal Canadiens. Whether you are customer today or still considering becoming a part of the family, I hope you will join me for this fun event to get to know our community. Los Angeles Kings vs Montreal Canadiens <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
Where: Staples Center 1111 S. Figueroa, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Wednesday, October 18th 7:30pm
Please note that seats for this event are limited and filling up fast. Reserve your spot today! <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
I hope to see you there,
Steve Corndell Vice President, Turbonomic
